solution_line_template: The original flock gains {ducks_born_per_year}-{ducks_killed_per_year}=<<{ducks_born_per_year}-{ducks_killed_per_year}={net_gain_per_year}>>{net_gain_per_year} ducks per year
So after {years_passed} years they have gained {net_gain_per_year}*{years_passed}=<<{net_gain_per_year}*{years_passed}={total_gain_over_years}>>{total_gain_over_years} ducks
So the original flock has {original_flock_size}+{total_gain_over_years}=<<{original_flock_size}+{total_gain_over_years}={flock_size_after_years}>>{flock_size_after_years} ducks
So the combined flock has {flock_size_after_years}+{second_flock_size}=<<{flock_size_after_years}+{second_flock_size}={combined_flock_size}>>{combined_flock_size} ducks
